title: 2  Introduction to Remote Sensing
text:
2.1 Summary

2.1.1 Learning Objectives

Have a basic idea of remote sensing




2.1.2 Remote Sensors

Passive sensors systems
Active sensors systems
SAR



2.1.3 Electromagnetic waves

wave length
velocity
frequency



2.1.3.2 Related jargon

Electromagnetic radiation(EMR)
radiant energy

shortwave radiation
solar irradiacne
exitance(emmittance)

surface
BRDF
Polarization
Fluorensence
atmospheric
Rayleigh
Mie
Non selective

2.1.4.1 Data formats


2.1.4.2 Four resolutions
Spatial Resolution
Spectral Resolution
Radiometric Resolution
Temporal Resolution

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.
